mapper.select: select * from VoteUser where vuUsername = #{vuUsername} and vuPassword = #{vuPassword}
mapper.update: update VoteUser set vuStatus=2,vuUpTime=sysdate where vuUsername = #{vuUsername}
mapper.select: select * from VoteUser where vuUsername = #{vuUsername} and vuStatus=1

select (select count(1) from VoteUser where vuVersion=0) total, nn.* from ( select rownum rn,a.* from ( select vu.*, (select count(distinct(vs.vsId)) from VoteItem vi,VoteSubject vs where vsStatus!=3 and vi.vsId=vs.vsId and vi.vuId=vu.vuId) totalVote from VoteUser vu where vuVersion=0 order by vuUpTime desc) a where #{0}*#{1}>=rownum ) nn where rn>(#{1}-1)*#{0}
mapper.update: update VoteUser set vuStatus=3,vuUpTime=sysdate where vuId = #{vuId}
